reviewText: The B-Side if you will of the story of ECW. The WWE produced documentary was full of archive footage to help tell the story. Forever Hardcore doesn't have that feature, but gives just as much insight into telling the story. This go around the story is told by a whole new cast of ECW originals. Who take you on a the crazy ride into the company that changed pro wrestling. Definitely as must have for any true fan.
Zero issues great to deal with. The product was as descried with easy packaging. A safe way to ensure protection of any powered device.
